message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I'm glad we're close to a deal, Bob! I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
